Guides and how-tos
==================

Here we will take a look more closely at how to use Iroha.
In essence, this section is a collection of how-tos for different scenarios:
- how to install Iroha
- what is required to build client libraries and how to use them (for example https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/javatutorial)
- how to use CLI
- how to deploy a network of Iroha peers, etc.

    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Table of contents

    configuration.rst
    deployment.rst
    libraries.rst
    dependencies.rst
